subclass.name: Oath of the Working Class
subclassFeatures: Oath of the Working Class|Paladin||Working Class|OathoftheWorkingClass|3

subclassFeature.name: Oath of the Working Class
entries: The Oath of the Working Class is fully committed to protecting those engaged in manual-labour occupations or industrial work and who cannot protect themselves from the inequality perpetuated by those above them in the social chain.

When the acts of those who control the means of production become vile, the one whose flame of revolt grows unceasingly emerges as a champion of the proletariat, and under the Oath of the Working Class they incite the uprising and resistance.

subclassFeature.name: Tenets of the Working Class
entries: The tenets of the Oath of the Working Class may vary in intensity and mode of action, but all revolve around fight alongside the underprivileged against the powerful willing to limit the freedom and condition of life of those who work for them. Its central principles are simple.

entries.name: Fight for Those Who Have to Work
entries: Under inhuman working regimes, there are many who do not have the strength to do anything but keep breathing. You are the stronghold that will always seek to protect these people.

entries.name: No Mercy to the Profiteers
entries: Those who exploit my comrades do not deserve my mercy nor my respect.

entries.name: Support for the Strikes
entries: Don't be a strikebreaker. You will always support uprisings against those who own the means of production.

entries.name: Make the Revolution
entries: The forces that try to rule you and your comrades never sleep. Your plans and actions must always be aimed at the fight of the class.

subclassFeature.name: Oath Spells
entries: You gain oath spells at the paladin levels listed.

subclassFeature.name: Channel Divinity
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you gain the following Channel Divinity options.

entries.name: Revolution Smite
entries: You know how to arouse your teammates' will to fight when you land your strikes. Once per turn, whenever you hit with an attack and choose to apply your Divine Smite, you can expend your Channel Divinity to give a bonus equal your Charisma modifier in the next attack roll to all friendly creatures within 10 feet of you.

entries.name: Incite the Mob
entries: As a bonus action, you can ignite the ardor within your companions with your Channel Divinity. Each creature of your choice that can hear you within 30 feet of you gains temporary hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} + your Charisma modifier (minimum of 1) and has its speed increased by 10 feet for 1 minute.

subclassFeature.name: Aura of Revolution
entries: Beginning at 7th leveI, the unshakable will that flows from you to your fellows becomes almost tangible. You and friendly creatures within 10 feet of you have advantage on Charisma saving throws.
When you reach 18th level in this class, the range of the aura increases to 30 feet.

subclassFeature.name: Strength in Numbers
entries: Starting at 15th level, when one or more friendly creatures are within 10 feet of you, you gain a bonus to your attack rolls equal to that number of creatures (maximum of 3). Also, whenever a creature tries to hit you with a melee attack, a creature within 10 feet of you can use its reaction to give you a bonus to your AC equal to its Charisma modifier until the end of the current turn. You can only receive this bonus from one creature per turn.

subclassFeature.name: Working Class Hero
entries: At 20th level, you become the personification of revolution in the heart of the working class. As a bonus action, you explode your willpower, and gain the following benefits for 1 minute:

items: A glowing energy of objectivity in your eyes propels you towards your goals. Your walking speed increases by 10 feet.
You emanate an aura of mental resilience in a 30-foot radius. You and any ally who starts their turn within this aura can't be {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened} or {@condition paralyzed}.

When you hit a creature with an attack roll and deal damage to it, you can also force it and any other creature you can see within 40 feet of it, at your choice, to make a Charisma saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed save, the creature drop whatever it is holding and become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute.

entries: Once you use this bonus action, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest, unless you expend a 5th-level spell slot to use it again.
